column4: Hey, I just installed the fluxbox packages from synpatic but when I boot to fluxbox the menu doesn't show on right-click
am considering installing fluxbox since GNOME is not lean and mean enough for me.  how do you like it?
i remember blackbox and how great that was, so...it seems natural
I've used it once or twice and have come to like it but for some reason it doesn't want to work right on my desktop here =\
